alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Meriden Rest Area to near La Grange. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... La Grange around 525 PM MDT. Meriden Rest Area around 555 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County
